match_summary.key_tactical_story: The match was a tightly contested affair decided by set-pieces, with both teams scoring penalties and free kicks. Red Team exploited crosses from the left wing, while Black/White team struggled to defend set pieces effectively.

strengths_to_keep.evidence: Scored 1 penalty at 44:04 and a direct free-kick goal at 132:13
strengths_to_keep.keep_doing: Continue practicing set-piece routines, especially free-kicks from promising locations. Analyze free kick locations to understand placement of strike.

weaknesses_to_fix.training_focus: Defensive positioning in the box, discipline in tackles, especially when a player is turned around, in our own 18 yard box. Emphasize avoiding unnecessary fouls in dangerous areas.

their_threats.evidence: Goals at 86:39, 129:08 from left side crosses
their_threats.how_to_defend: Assign a dedicated player to track and pressure the left winger, provide additional defensive cover with a second player. Focus on cutting the crossing angle at the source (fullback) as the point of defence.

their_weaknesses.evidence: Conceded penalty at 44:04, and numerous free kicks near the box.
their_weaknesses.how_to_exploit: Draw fouls in attacking third, utilize players skilled at winning free kicks, especially in wide areas. Practice crossing set-piece plays as they may be unorganized in their defence.

training_priorities.focus: Defending crosses from the left wing
training_priorities.drill: Defensive drills focusing on tracking wingers, double-teaming, and cutting off crossing angles.
training_priorities.measure: Reduce number of crosses completed and shots taken from crosses.

next_match_tactics.if_facing_similar_opponent: Prioritize double-marking the opponent's left winger. Instruct the right fullback to remain compact to mitigate crossing oportunities.
next_match_tactics.set_piece_focus: Spend extra time on defensive set piece drills, focusing on wall positioning and marking assignments. Watch video on defensive organisation of set-pieces.
next_match_tactics.attacking_plan: Focus on winning free kicks in the attacking third, particularly in wide areas, to exploit their set-piece vulnerability. Consider playing an extra player to exploit runs from set pieces.
